sources.title: Pirate Treasure (1934) RICHARD TALMADGEüçï12-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGER
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Marathon Edition! Complete 12-chapter Cliffhanger!
Starring: Richard Talmadge, Lucille Lund, Walter Miller
Directed by: Ray Taylor

In this Swashbuckling Serial, after a record-breaking round-the-world flight, a daredevil aviator uses his winnings to finance a hunt for the pirate treasure that was buried long ago by an ancestor.

üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00        PizzaFLIX Intro
1:04        CHAPTER 1:  Stolen Treasure
19:57      CHAPTER 2:  The Death Plunge
36:53      CHAPTER 3:  The Wheels of Fate
57:10      CHAPTER 4:  The Sea Chase
1:12:53   CHAPTER 5:  Into the Depths
1:30:24   CHAPTER 6:  The Death Crash
1:47:36   CHAPTER 7:  Crashing Doom
2:05:50   CHAPTER 8:  Mutiny
2:24:24   CHAPTER 9:  Hidden Gold
2:43:10   CHAPTER 10:  The Fight for the Treasure
3:03:10   CHAPTER 11:  The Fatal Plunge
3:20:44   CHAPTER 12:  Captured
3:41:28  Please Subscribe!

metadata.Plot: Adventurer Dick Moreland (Richard Talmadge) makes the announcement, during a reception at the Aeroclub, that he is going to search for a treasure buried on a tropical island by one of his piratical ancestors. But criminal lawyer Stanley Brasset (Walter Miller0 decides to steal Moreland's map and go after the treasure himself. Despite the help of his henchmen---Curt (Ethan Laidlaw), Tony (Al Ferguson), Bert (Edmund Cobb) and Jed (George DeNormand), and henchwoman Marge (Beulah Hutton), Brassett's efforts to get the map fail. His motley crew also fails to sabotage Moreland's boat-schooner. Once upon the island, Brasset & Company do manage to steal the treasure...but then are promptly attacked and captured by the island's natives. Now, Dick has to get the treasure back and also rescue Brasset and his employees.
metadata.Writer: Ella O'Neill, George H. Plympton, Jack Nelson
metadata.Actors: Richard Talmadge, Lucille Lund, Walter Miller
